bio: Studied Architecture and Mathematics in university, I knew that these courses would help me perfect my already God-given talent of Fine-art. abstrac: Editor, Ghostwriter, Online Course Development, Ebook Formatting
bio:
My 20 years in the writing and publishing industry involves mostly working on books, writing compelling speeches, and developing online courses for publishers and clients. I also manage authors with marketing, book signings, and events. 

I work with high level life coaches in the self help genre, health, nutrition, Christian, spiritual, business books, and fiction novels in all genres. Three of my books are award winning bestsellers on Amazon and I worked with producers in converting them to screenplays. I've also ghostwritten 12 children's books and served as the lead writer of the Children's Writing Group comprised of many published authors.

I am accessible and you can call or contact me anytime during the project. 

Academic background. Editorial assistant for United Nations ambassador. Accomplished pianist. Can edit music composition.

Technical skills: indexing services and formatting files on any platform (CreateSpace, Kindle, Smashwords, IngramSpark).
SafePay.

IIS, ApachePersonalized world class Mobile and Web solutions for your business. Proven expe

WORK HOURS AND DAY:

EVERY DAY 12 HOURS FROM MONDAY TO FRIDAY. Weekends if required.

COMMUNICATION ON PHONE, SKYPE, IM, EMAIL ETC.

PAYMENT TERMS:

For projects over USD 1000 :
I usually charge 25% advance and the all other project payments are based on various milestone based on updates shown as per the project plan. The contract service agreement includes the final proposal having clear updates based milestones, Assumptions, support period along with standard business terms. Delivery will be made after final payment.

For projects equal to or under USD 1000 :

**30% upfront, to get us started on selection.
**70% on showing completed work.

The aforementioned milestones are set after thorough discussion with our clients. I am, nevertheless, open to FAIR negotiation. I will sign a standard NDA on request and also provide 30 days free technical support, after delivery.

Please, note:

I am flexible to discuss and agree the payment terms and schedule that works best for both parties.

abstrac: Experienced SEO, SMM and SEM Expert | Get Top Ranking in Google
bio:
Hi, this is Nayan Majumder. I am a SEO Expert both On Page and Off Page. I have 11 years experience in SEO. I always stay up to date with the changes of the search engine's algorithm and using the appropriate method to get my client's site on top of the search result.  

MY SEO PRORAM - 

On-Page SEO:
• Extensive Research from the Start! – It’s all about driving relevant traffic!
• Competitive research
• Keyword and citation building research
• On-Page site optimization for targeted keywords/phrases
• Unique and relevant page titles, descriptions and heading tags creation/re-writes
• Local optimization strategy for targeted regions
• Internal linking work and fixes
• Review and address crawlability issues so search engines can find your site
• URL, video and image optimization
• Robots.txt file modification/setup
• Google Analytics and Webmaster Tools setup and monitoring
• Creation and submission of XML sitemaps to Google and Bing
• Schema Implementation
• Redirect assessment and fixes
• On-Page activities performed as part of the One to Three Month Build Phase period

My White Hat Link Building process will help your site develop a diverse link portfolio, increase your online brand presence, establish a trust factor with the search engines, drive targeted traffic to your site and more!

Off-Page SEO:
• Off-Page SEO activities commence once all on-page activities are completed
• Local Business Listings
• Local Directory Submissions, Social Bookmarking
• Ongoing relevant and real link building.
• Participate in niche forum discussions and answer the questions
• Facebook, Twitter, Google My Business and LinkedIn creation and optimization

Why you'll hire me ?
Because I'm experienced, honest, fast and reliable.

abstrac: Professional Developmental Editor, Line Editor, Copyeditor, Proofreader, and Interior Book Designer
bio:
Welcome to my profile! For as long as you stay, I hope you enjoy your time.

Your number one question should be whether or not you need my services. My number one question is have you finished your manuscript? If you can answer yes to that question, then you’re in need of a book expert—someone who is capable of editing your manuscript for:

❖ Content (flow, character development, plot development, etc.), 
❖ Grammar (noun-verb agreement, danglers, tense, word usage, etc.), 
❖ Spelling (is it their, there, or they're?), 
❖ Punctuation (does that comma go there, is that the proper formatting for an ellipsis?),
❖ Proper capitalization of terms (Government or government?),
❖ Proper treatment of numbers (101 or one hundred and one?),
❖ Proper formatting of foreign terms (avec vous?),
❖ Quotations and dialogue formatting (single quotations for a quote inside of character speech or double?),
❖ Reference formatting and fact checking,
❖ And so many other editing errors I’ve come across in my eight years of editing for authors.

However, I’m not just an editor. You see, I self-published years ago on various different platforms, and I transposed that skill I learned from my personal life into my professional one. I’m capable of formatting your manuscript for electronic publication and paperback publication for the following platforms:

❖ Amazon KDP
❖ Barnes & Noble's Nook
❖ Kobo
❖ Smashwords
❖ Lulu
❖ BookBaby

If you are thinking of publishing on a different platform, I’m a quick learner. Honestly, there are a few things to tweak here and there to make a document compatible on a different platform. Just ask, and I’ll let you know if I can work my magic.

Interested in my specs?

I’ve professionally content edited, line edited, copyedited, proofread, and formatted manuscripts for self-publication, submission to literary agents, and submission to publishers for the past eight years working with a myriad of different genres. I’m always looking to learn something new.
I am available Monday-Friday from 8 a.m. to 5 p.m. EST and Saturday from 12 p.m. to 5 p.m. EST.
